name: Falsifiable
description: Makes the element set Boolean properties to false if the corresponding attribute is set to 'false'.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.description: Overrides Polymer.Base.deserialize method to convert string values of 'true' or 'false' to Boolean values.

arguements.name: value
arguements.description: The value of the property being changed.

arguements.name: type
arguements.description: The type of the property being changed.
